entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog at times overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
